meanings.definition: Indicating the agent performing an action
meanings.sent1: The cake was made by a skilled baker.
meanings.sent2: The book was written by the author.
meanings.sent3: The mystery was solved by a clever detective.
meanings.sent4: The painting was created by a talented artist.
meanings.sent5: The problem was fixed by a knowledgeable technician.

meanings.definition: Indicating the means or method used
meanings.sent1: She cut the paper by using scissors.
meanings.sent2: He traveled by train to reach the destination.
meanings.sent3: The message was sent by email to avoid delays.
meanings.sent4: The cake was baked by following the recipe.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was solved by thinking carefully.

meanings.definition: Indicating the location or position of something
meanings.sent1: The keys were found by the door.
meanings.sent2: The cat sat by the window.
meanings.sent3: The flowers were planted by the fence.
meanings.sent4: The cup was placed by the sink.
meanings.sent5: The dog slept by the fireplace.

meanings.definition: Indicating the time at which something happens
meanings.sent2: She finishes her work by the deadline.
meanings.sent3: He wakes up by sunrise every day.
